content.html: Every November 20th, I play Celeste until I reach the memorial. After dozens of playthroughs, I still cry when I see it. I almost perished on the climb, but I made it. Others weren't as lucky. They deserved so much better. (Art by u/PeliPal on Reddit)
content.value:
Every November 20th, I play Celeste until I reach the memorial. After dozens of playthroughs, I still cry when I see it.

I almost perished on the climb, but I made it. Others weren't as lucky.

They deserved so much better.

(Art by u/PeliPal on Reddit)

photo.alt:
Madeline at the memorial at the end of the first level of Celeste. Madeline has pink hair, which occurs in the game after she comes to terms with herself and her struggles. The text above the monument is colored like the trans flag and reads:

-- Transgender Day of Remembrance --
This memorial dedicated and loving memory
To all who perished on the climb
